modName: Better Wearing Position of Swords for XPMS
summary:
This is a Skeleton file that I made by adjusting one-handed sword\'s wearing position of XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS.
I adjusted the position so that swords does not dangle on your hip and not buried to your body.
descriptionHtml:
[u]I\'m not good at English.  I\'m sorry but you may be hard to read my sentence.[/u]


[size=5][color=Aqua][b]===What is this?===[/b][/color][/size]

[size=4][b]This is a Skeleton file that I adjusted one-handed sword\'s wearing position of.
I modified [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26800]XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS[/url] and made this skeleton so that swords does not dangle on your hip and not buried to your body.
I think the adjustment resembles [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18044]Way of the Sword - Skyrim Katana Revised.[/url][/b][/size]


[size=5][b][color=moccasin]See screenshots...[/color][/b][/size]
(I\'m using DSpSoB in the SS)



More precisely, tktk(Author of \"Enhanced Character Edit\") modified XPMS and made a skeleton compatible with ECE 1.0.
And I modified it and made this skeleton.

[size=4][b]So it is compatible with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12951]Enhanced Character Edit[/url], and Neck down and waist sliders of it.

And of course compatible with 

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34155]Dual Shealth Redux[/url](Adjusted about left hand\'s sword.)
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/601]Realistic Ragdolls &Force[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34917]Deadly Mutilation[/url]
Breast motion from CHSBHC/UNPB-BBP
Breast motion for TBBP animation

as XPMS.[/b][/size]

[size=5][color=Aqua][b]===Installation===[/b][/color][/size]

First, Install [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26800]XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS[/url].
And overwrite it by my mod.



===Credits===

Thanks to XP32 for XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS
Thanks to tktk for Enhanced Character Edit
Thanks to Seven Black for the original idea from \"Way of the Sword - Skyrim Katana Revised\"
author: mikogamiten
